ygData.subject: Re: The good news :)
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t mind the self only thing... that s fine.  My only question is this...  Does the haste of these songs improve?  I mean, otherwise they would be
ygData.messageBody:
I don't mind the self only thing... that's fine. My only question is
this... Does the haste of these songs improve? I mean, otherwise
they would be worthless upgrades, right?

~Beatdrop

--- In eqbards@egroups.com, "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
<garramone@l...> wrote:
> his latest updates show that only the Johnathan's songs are having
their
> absorption removed, Niv's and Wee are remaining as they are. and
yes all 3
> johnathan's songs will now be self-only.
>
> Shada
>
>
> > Well, how lovely :).
